Class SaveManager

java.lang.Object
SaveManager
public class SaveManager extends Object
SaveManager reads/writes simple save data to a text file. Saved data - roomR, roomC - visited grid - cleared grid - lastRoomR,lastRoomC File format example: roomR=1 roomC=2 visited=1101/0111/0101/1111 cleared=1000/0100/0000/0000 playerHealt=5 roomsCleared=2 coins=10;

      Parameters:

    • load

      public static SaveData load(GameMap map)
      Loads progress from file and applies visited/cleared onto the map.
      Parameters:
      map - map to apply visited/cleared into
      Returns:
      SaveData if loaded, or null if missing/invalid
